message: I'm not getting nearly enough (any) emacs on my tumblr dashboard. So I've started a http://emacsporn.tumblr.com ... if you have submissions that make sense on tumblr, please submit away.

may or may not be useful. http://i.imgur.com/BUlS1.jpg  from left to right top down:  awesomewm, conkeror (fantastic FF backed, emacs-like browser), emacs 24 (from trunk) [ new jquery plugin I'm writing, emms, eshell (is awesome, see other topic), and irc.
I've got emacs 23.2 running fullscreen under dwm (http://dwm.suckless.org) http://i.imgur.com/WDjzU.png. Default color theme, rcirc, chicken scheme, and a clojure buffer.
Awesome. I'll post these. Also, if you have any favorite emacs little facts, I'd love to post those too. "M-x butterfly" or whatever. If there are any other tumblr users, I'm happy to add more users.
i've got a tumblr account, i'd love to be added.
@justinlilly I gotta be honest with you... I'm not sure. I used to have an .Xresources file, then my disk died and I started from scratch with whatever was default. I'll check when I get in
